text: yunusge janaya hæra, visvasa kala kavara ho gamvasi pirisakata ovunge visvasaya prayojanayak vana bavata kumak ho adarsayak tibeda? (evæni kisindu adarsayak næta) . ovuhu visvasa kala kalhi melova jivitaye avamanaye danduvama api ovungen ivat kota mada kalakata ovunata bhukti vindinnata sælæssuvemu
